Articles.Content:
Hey Blizzy, I'm having problems with the 'Space Dunk' achievement triggering when it shouldn't.

Thanks, it's already on my list of things to fix. Since I tend to forget as I'm getting older, I've also created an issue in the issue tracker now: https://github.com/blizzy78/ksp_achievements/issues/4
Achievements Plugin 1.5.5 is now available for download, fixing a few bugs related to docking and Kerbal EVA.
Hooray. Thank you blizzy!
Just letting you know that when I try to use this on my Debian system (64bit), it says that it's not compatitble with my version of KSP (.23)
Thanks! I'm guessing it was fixed in the latest update too. I love this mod, thanks for keeping it updated.

great stuff. added to my collection of mods!

Suggestion for Achievements if there isnt one:

" Lawn Dart " or " Dirt Dart " - Your Kerbal impacts the ground from xxxx meters high and dies.

" Ludicrous Speed " or/and " We've gone plaid " - reach some crazy terminal velocity or speed.

" Dinotomic State " - An asteroid of certain xxx size impacts Kerbin

" Sun Spots " - Impact into the sun

" Two Ton Tessy " - Build an exact 2 ton vehicle

" Everything but the Kitchen Sink " - use every part in the game on 1 vehicle

" It's the Klaw! " - attach and use the klaw to capture an asteroid

...lol just what I had off the top of my head..
So who's excited for some asteroid achievements?

So who's excited for some asteroid achievements?

I put a few in my list... but yeah should be kool
I'm getting a message that the mod is incompatible with the new ARM update when the game loads. I'm not sure if it actually still works or not.

I'm getting a message that the mod is incompatible with the new ARM update when the game loads. I'm not sure if it actually still works or not.

This is intended.

Achievements Plugin 1.6.0 is now available for download.

Edit: Linux users who are getting a popup at the main menu stating that this version is incompatible with KSP 0.23.5 will want to redownload again. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Edited April 2, 2014 by blizzy78
Download link is broken for me.

Download link is broken for me.

Open the download page, then press F5 to refresh your browser.

I like the mod ... except the (too loud) sound, which I always delete, and the fact that every achievement displays the message too long for my taste, and too big. I'd rather have a blinking icon in the toolbar and I'll take a look when I have the time, not while monitoring engine readouts during launch and the golden plate blocks the info, for example.

Feature request: Different levels for each achievement. Bronze: Gain the achievement in this save on a flight you reverted. Silver: Achievement gained in any save on a legitimate flight. Gold: Achievement earned in this save on a legitimate flight.

Edward

Bronze: Gain the achievement in this save on a flight you reverted. Silver: Achievement gained in any save on a legitimate flight.

Unfortunately, these are not going to happen. Achievements status is saved per-save. Reverting to a previous state will also revert achievements status.
Ahh, I had seen previously you had saved achievements in a dat file. Then how about just bronze and gold, for reverted and legitimate flights respectively?
The plugin doesn't know when the player reverts the save. It just gets restarted with reverted data.
Ah now I understand. A pity but oh well ;']

a few more suggestions since my first set of suggestions wasn't good...

" Playing Pool with the Planets " - Guide an asteroid into a planet.

" That's no moon.... " - Catch a huge asteroid of xxx size

" The right stuff... " - Build a x-1 size aircraft(or by weight) and reach a xxx velocity

" Road trip " - Drive xxx amount of Meters/Km's across kerbin

" Prepare to get Probed! " - Launch a probe.

" I've lost the bleeps the sweeps and the creeps... " - Lose 3 tracked asteroids

" Batteries not included... " - Did not place batteries on a craft /or probe

" Northern Exposure " Visit and place a flag at the north pole

...there is my second set....
How exactly do you install this? I got an error message saying incorrect path...?

How exactly do you install this? I got an error message saying incorrect path...?

Put both the blizzy\ and the 000_Toolbar\ folders into your GameData\ folder.

Put both the blizzy\ and the 000_Toolbar\ folders into your GameData\ folder.

Is it possible to move the 'Configure visible toolbars' button?

Edit: Found it

Hello,

Awesome MOD ! I am using it in Career mode so far so good...

Not sure if it has been suggested...build a small base on an asteroid...parts must included certain stock parts???

Or have a record of certain parts landed on a particular size asteroid??

Cdr Zeta
one for 100+ tons to orbit? more of a challenge than 10-50 tons
